name: Barian's Chaos Draw
text:
To activate this card, you must draw it for your normal draw in your Draw Phase, reveal it, and keep it revealed until the Main Phase 1. During your Main Phase 1 that same turn: You can activate 1 of these effects.
? Send 1 "Rank-Up-Magic - The Seventh One" or 1 "Seven Emperors" Normal Spell from your Deck to the GY; this effect becomes that Spell's effect when that card is activated.
? Special Summon up to 2 monsters from your Deck, but negate their effects, then, immediately after this effect resolves, Xyz Summon 1 "Number" Xyz Monster using monsters you control, including all the Summoned monsters.
